titleStmt.title: Hieragonisticon, or, Corah's doom being an answer to two letters of enquiry into the grounds and occasions of the contempt of the clergy and religion : in vindication of the contemned [sic] : by way of epistle to the author of the said enquiry.
titleStmt.author: D. T.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Milbourn for Dorman Newman ...,
